ORGANIZATION_NAME_TOO_LONG: Organization name is too long (maximum {maxLength} characters)
ORGANIZATION_SLUG_TOO_LONG: Organization slug is too long (maximum {maxLength} characters)
ORGANIZATION_DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG: Organization description is too long (maximum {maxLength} characters)
ORGANIZATION_WEBSITE_URL_TOO_LONG: Organization website URL is too long (maximum {maxLength} characters)
ORGANIZATION_LOGO_URL_TOO_LONG: Organization logo URL is too long (maximum {maxLength} characters)
ORGANIZATION_PERMISSION_DENIED: You don't have permission to perform this action on this organization
ORGANIZATION_OWNER_ONLY: Only the organization owner can perform this action
ORGANIZATION_ADMIN_ONLY: Only organization administrators can perform this action
ORGANIZATION_ACCESS_DENIED: You don't have access to this organization
ORGANIZATION_MEMBER_ALREADY_EXISTS: User is already a member of this organization
ORGANIZATION_ROLE_ASSIGNED: Role assigned to organization member successfully
ORGANIZATION_ROLE_REMOVED: Role removed from organization member successfully
ORGANIZATION_ROLE_ALREADY_ASSIGNED: Role is already assigned to this member
ORGANIZATION_ROLE_NOT_ASSIGNED: Role is not assigned to this member
ORGANIZATION_SLUG_GENERATION_FAILED: Failed to generate unique organization slug
ORGANIZATION_DEFAULT_ROLES_FAILED: Failed to create default organization roles
ORGANIZATION_BULK_OPERATION_FAILED: Bulk operation failed for some organizations
ORGANIZATION_NETWORK_ERROR: Network error occurred while processing organization
ORGANIZATION_RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Rate limit exceeded for organization operations
ORGANIZATION_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Internal server error occurred while processing organization
